verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [V: urged] [ARG1: China] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG2: to maintain a secure border with North Korea] , [ARG2: pressing Beijing ahead of his anticipated meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un next month] aimed at denuclearization.</p >

< p > U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday urged [ARG0: China] on Monday to [V: maintain] [ARG1: a secure border with North Korea] , pressing Beijing ahead of his anticipated meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un next month aimed at denuclearization.</p >
